PHRASE.LANG: Available ONLY for the 2010 holiday season, this sweater is guaranteed to make you look like your third grade teacher on Christmas Party Day. Happy Holidays from Codename Games! [#Legal]

Disponible UNIQUEMENT durant la période des fêtes 2010, ce sweatshirt vous assurera de ressembler à votre professeur de primaire le jour du Goûter de Noël. Joyeuses Fêtes de la part de Codename Games ! [#Legal]
Available ONLY for the 2010 holiday season, this sweater is guaranteed to make you look like your third grade teacher on Christmas Party Day. Happy Holidays from Codename Games! [#Legal]
